mapper.select: select users.`user_id` as userId ,users.`realname` as realName , users.`email` ,users.`dept_id` as deptId ,users.`department_name` as deptName ,users.`domain_id` as domainId ,users.`is_director` as isDirector from `users` where users.`account_id` in (select account_id from accounts where accounts.`login_name`=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and accounts.`login_password`=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
select user_id as userId, realname as realName from users where user_id = #{id} and valid = 0
